.. _Example:

Example
=======

These example demonstrates an optimization task using various modules from the AMOFMS package. It includes setting up paths, importing necessary modules, initializing parameters, defining the optimization task, and executing the optimization process.

See the following pages for the full illustration of each example:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   example/POPC/popc
   example/PEO/peo
